attributes.action: All foreigner people coming to the UK, to take driving test in the UK.
attributes.background: When people coming to live in the UK, should take a driving test before acquiring a UK driving licence.  AS THE BRITISH ROADS ARE DANGEROUS NOW. There are really bad drivers on our roads.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717758
